BasicInfo.short: Gigya offers a Customer Identity Management Platform that businesses can use to identify customers, aggregate data & personalize campaigns.

Products.name: Loyalty
Products.description: Gamification incentivizes users to perform valuable actions on a site or app, which can be consolidated to form a complete customer view.

Products.name: Registration-as-a-Service (RaaS)
Products.description: RaaS is an end-to-end registration system that provides both social and traditional registration flows.

Products.name: Profile Management Database
Products.description: Profile Management is a cloud-hosted database designed to consolidate and manage cross-channel identity, transactional and behavioral data.

Products.name: Social Login
Products.description: Social login allows users to register for and sign in to a site or app with an existing social media profile or pre-validated user account.

Products.name: Social Plugins
Products.description: Plugins for comments and ratings and reviews work together and integrate with social login, sharing and gamification.

Products.name: Customer Insights
Products.description: Customer Insights is a web-based dashboard that provides easy access to end-user data to quickly build audience segments and custom reports.

PastTeam.title: Lead Ad Operations, Implementation and Accounts Manager
